did.abstract: This collection consists of John F. Finerty's files, containing correspondence, minutes, and printed materials covering the period 1943-1966, concerning the Robert Marshall Civil Liberties Trust.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Robert Marshall Civil Liberties Trust was founded in 1943 for the purposes of preserving and safeguarding the cause of civil liberties.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Finerty's files, 1943-1966, containing correspondence, minutes, and printed materials by and relating to the Robert Marshall Civil Liberties Trust.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
This collection is arranged in one series:
Series I: Papers

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is located off-site. You will need to request this material at least twenty-four (24) hours in advance to use the collection in the Rare Book and Manuscript Library reading room.
